name: Above The clouds (ReeceyBoy)
description:
A low-poly style exploration game set above the clouds, traverse the skies and find the mystery of the floating islands and what came before...

Play as different types of origami entities using there separate advantages to get around and find new areas to explore.     

Currently in development, enjoy this small demo and any feedback is much appreciated.

Get notified on development and release:   

Email List: https://crowther.wixsite.com/abovetheclouds
